text: Betulia can refer to: * The biblical city of Bethulia, alias Betuloua * Betulia, Antioquia in Colombia * Betulia, Santander in Colombia * 1580 Betulia (provisional designation: 1950 KA), an Amor asteroid discovered on May 22, 1950 * The opera by Pietro Metastasio (see also the Mozart's Oratorio Betulia Liberata, K. 118 - 74c) ==See also== * Betula * Betuliad
title: Betulia
